name: Wagner
description:
Comes with 2 Forging Billets when played. If your deck originally includes at least 3 different types of Weapons, you will randomly also draw 1 Weapon Card from your deck.
End Phase: This card will gain 1 Forging Billet.
When playing a Weapon Card: If possible, spend Forging Billets equal to the total cost of the Weapon and equip this Weapon for free. (Once per Round)
